text: The Four Horsemen were a very popular professional wrestling stable in the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA) and World Championship Wrestling (WCW). They debuted 1986 and disbanded 1999, The original members of the stable were Ric Flair, Arn Anderson, Tully Blanchard, and Ole Anderson. The stable is named after Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. The stable was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame by Dusty Rhodes in 2012. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Four Horsemen's profile on WWE.com Category:World Championship Wrestling teams and stables Category:WWE people Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: The Four Horsemen (professional wrestling)
